item.title: SIMSEC
item.description: SIMSEC The following articles are being provided to support your preparations for the DAYMUNC simulation. Although no one of these articles should be considered indicative of the situations you will confront, your cognizance of the international rules and norms (or lack thereof) that currently or could one day play a role in each will assist you throughout the simulation. https://www.rferl.org/a/turkey-ukraine-erdogan-wrath-ukraine-live-in-fear-of-kyiv-kidnapping-/29715899.html https://www.cfr.org/article/geopolitical-flash-points-2019 https://media.defense.gov/2019/Jan/16/2002080386/-1/-1/1/190115-F-NV711-0002.PDF https://www.defensenews.com/breaking-news/2019/01/17/space-based-interceptors-and-drones-with-lasers-the-pentagons-missile-defense-review-wish-list-revealed/ Committee Documents: There is no background guide provided for the Simulated Security Council - should you have questions concerning this type of committee, please contact the Secretary General.
